newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Versant Object cut to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Versant Object cut to buy.

text.p: -- Volpe Brown Whelan & Co analyst Paul Bloom on Thursday cut his rating for Versant Object Technology Corp to buy from strong buy.
-- Bloom said in a report he downgraded the shares because Versant had announced its first quarter results would be below expectations.
-- "We would, however, recommend purchase for investors with a longer time-horizon who wish to participate in the emerging and very exciting object technology market."
-- He set a 12- to 18-month price target for the shares of $20.
-- Shares in the Menlo Park, Calif., company were down one to 5-1/4 in heavy trade.
